page.title: 15TWO INDUSTRIAL ESTATES
page.content: Within this area is a small Council house estate comprising of 86 semi-detached properties a short distance away from a gypsy camp laid out by City Council. This consists of 31 fixed mobile homes/caravans. These gypsies are of Irish origin, mainly 'tinkers'; not the true Romanies. The rest of this area is taken up by light industries, showrooms and workshops prestigious foreign cars. BMW, Audi/VW, Saab, Toyota, Daihatsu, Mitsubishi and Hyundu may all be purchased and sericed here. Prices range from 3,979.20 - 33,260 pounds for one of these cars. All the pupils from 2M who assisted in this project enjoyed a ride in the 33,260 BMW Coupe-there was good publicity in the Kentish Gazette for the firm and the BBC Domesday Project!
